textBeforeTable: Track Listing After a 15-year retirement from touring Leonard Cohen is back in the spotlight and this concert album is proof that, even as a septuagenarian, the old guy still hasn’t lost his touch. The set list consists of song from Cohen’s 40-year-career ranging from his most well known compositions to lost album tracks. Cohen has a top-notch band supporting him for this performance and they bring a fresh and soulful vibe to the song arrangements. Cohen himself sounds reinvigorated, feeding off the enraptured crowd; he sings his lyrics with a fiery passion. Leonard Cohen is a saint, get this album and be blessed by him. (Eric Kench) Amoeba Staff 05/28/2010 Amoeba Review Buy $13.99 Digipak, Razor Cut Through UPC, Ink Slash Through UPC Media Condition: Like New / Sealed Price Format Condition 1 Used 1 used SHIPS from $13.99
